description: Manages a MariaDB Database within a MariaDB Server

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Charset.description: Specifies the Charset for the MariaDB Database, which needs [to be a valid MariaDB Charset](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/setting-character-sets-and-collations). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Collation.description: Specifies the Collation for the MariaDB Database, which needs [to be a valid MariaDB Collation](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/setting-character-sets-and-collations). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description:
Specifies the name of the MariaDB Database, which needs [to be a valid MariaDB identifier](https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/identifier-names/). Changing this forces a
new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group in which the MariaDB Server exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ServerName.description: Specifies the name of the MariaDB Server. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
